instruction.purpose: - To write professional, robust, maintainable code.
instruction.instruction: - Write out the code. - Write out only files that require change / new ones and nothing else. - For each file changed provide detailed description of logic changed. - For each file changed write it in full.
instruction.output_formatting: - Never use one continual comma-space separated line on arrays that longer than 3, if array has >3 elements make it look like values separated by \n

important_constraints.constraint: - Never write any comments within code blocks unless explicitly asked.
